message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its value and quality, I believe it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. Considering its true worth and your potential interest, I propose a price of $100 for you to acquire this exceptional item. I hope we can reach an agreement that benefits both of us.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you highlighting the product's value, but $100 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $85, given my budget and the fact that I can get a similar product from John for $80. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the unique features and high-quality materials used in our product, I believe a price of $95 would be fair for both parties involved. This allows you to enjoy the benefits of our product while keeping your expenses manageable. I look forward to your consideration.
